languages.text: Целые стопки свитков изрисованы кругами. Каждый напоминает тот, что начертан на полу, но ни один не повторяет его в точности .
Circles have been scrawled over whole stacks of scrolls. Each circle resembles the one daubed on the floor, but none replicates it exactly.
languages.original_text: Целые стопки свитков изрисованы кругами. Каждый напоминает тот, что начертан на полу, но ни один не повторяет его в точности .

traits.locale_text: Circles have been scrawled over whole stacks of scrolls. Each circle resembles the one daubed on the floor, but none replicates it exactly.
Circles have been scrawled over whole stacks of scrolls. Each circle resembles the one daubed on the floor, but none replicates it exactly.
Circles have been scrawled over whole stacks of scrolls. Each circle resembles the one daubed on the floor, but none replicates it exactly.
Circles have been scrawled over whole stacks of scrolls. Each circle resembles the one daubed on the floor, but none replicates it exactly.
Circles have been scrawled over whole stacks of scrolls. Each circle resembles the one daubed on the floor, but none replicates it exactly.

languages.text: Über ganze Stapel von Schriftrollen wurden Kreise gekritzelt. Jeder Kreis erinnert an den auf den Boden geschmierten, aber keiner bildet ihn exakt ab.
languages.original_text: Circles have been scrawled over whole stacks of scrolls. Each circle resembles the one daubed on the floor, but none replicates it exactly.

traits.locale_text: Über ganze Stapel von Schriftrollen wurden Kreise gekritzelt. Jeder Kreis erinnert an den auf den Boden geschmierten, aber keiner bildet ihn exakt ab.

languages.text: Des piles entières de parchemins ont été marquées de cercles. Chacun ressemble au modèle barbouillé à même le sol, sans qu'aucun n'en soit la réplique exacte.
languages.original_text: Circles have been scrawled over whole stacks of scrolls. Each circle resembles the one daubed on the floor, but none replicates it exactly.

traits.locale_text: Des piles entières de parchemins ont été marquées de cercles. Chacun ressemble au modèle barbouillé à même le sol, sans qu'aucun n'en soit la réplique exacte.

languages.text: 一叠叠羊皮纸上，潦草地画着无数圆环。每个圆环都与地板上的圆环有些相似，但没有任何两个圆环是完全相同的。
languages.original_text: Circles have been scrawled over whole stacks of scrolls. Each circle resembles the one daubed on the floor, but none replicates it exactly.

traits.locale_text: 一叠叠羊皮纸上，潦草地画着无数圆环。每个圆环都与地板上的圆环有些相似，但没有任何两个圆环是完全相同的。

languages.text: Se han dibujado círculos por todo el montón de pergaminos. Todos ellos se asemejan al que está untado en el suelo, pero ninguno lo replica con exactitud.
languages.original_text: Circles have been scrawled over whole stacks of scrolls. Each circle resembles the one daubed on the floor, but none replicates it exactly.

traits.locale_text: Se han dibujado círculos por todo el montón de pergaminos. Todos ellos se asemejan al que está untado en el suelo, pero ninguno lo replica con exactitud.

languages.text: 巻物の束全体に円が落書きされている。それぞれの円は床に描かれたものに似ているが、正確にはどれも同じではない。
languages.original_text: Circles have been scrawled over whole stacks of scrolls. Each circle resembles the one daubed on the floor, but none replicates it exactly.

traits.locale_text: 巻物の束全体に円が落書きされている。それぞれの円は床に描かれたものに似ているが、正確にはどれも同じではない。

languages.text: Parşömen yığınlarının üzerine çemberler çizilmiş. Her bir çember, zemine çizilen daireye benzese de bunlardan hiçbiri bire bir aynısı değil.
languages.original_text: Circles have been scrawled over whole stacks of scrolls. Each circle resembles the one daubed on the floor, but none replicates it exactly.

traits.locale_text: Parşömen yığınlarının üzerine çemberler çizilmiş. Her bir çember, zemine çizilen daireye benzese de bunlardan hiçbiri bire bir aynısı değil.
